value:
It seems shallow to think you can
show how much you care about
someone by just giving them stuff.$k$pBut I guess it does feel pretty good
to get a gift...

Peace between Nohr and Hoshido?
Hmph, well...$k$pMaybe if we can focus on each
other as individuals rather than
solely on where we're from...

I just realized that I have no clue what
kind of gifts Oboro, Hinata, or even
my siblings would actually like.

Don't really know what I'm looking
for, but might as well start in town.
Lead the way, $Nu.

Whoa! You scared me. Hey, eyes off
the gifts! You'll get one in a second.
Hope you like it, or whatever...

Says here this is a token of thanks
from $Nf to you.

Who and what are most important to
me? That's what the Day of Devotion
seems to be all about.

Don't worry, I still have lots of gifts to
hand out. Just keep the line orderly—
hey, no pushing!

Jeez, they just keep coming! When I
said I had gifts left, I meant a few, not
a few hundred!

Oh, thanks. Why are you looking at
me like that? Don't tell me you want
a gift in return. *sigh* Fine...

I'm Takumi, from the kingdom of
Hoshido. What? I have to deliver gifts
to everyone? What a pain...

The Day of Devotion festival sounded
kind of boring, to be honest. But I'm
actually pretty glad I joined in.$k$pIt was nice to not only see happy
faces, but to think about the people
who have really helped me.$k$pI know I don't come off very warm,
so the festival was a handy excuse
to show my appreciation.$k$pIt's easy to take things like kindness
for granted, especially when you're in
a position of royalty like I am.$k$pI'm glad Sakura and Princess Elise
invited me to do this with them.
It'd feel so weird if I was on my own.$k$pAnyway, that was a lot of words just
to say "thanks" to you. For being one
of those people looking out for me.
No need to thank me!
You're in my way!
Check this out.
From my heart to yours!
I got careless...
Day of Devotion, huh? Fine, I guess...
Hey, watch where you're going! I almost dropped all these gifts.
Yeah, all right. I'll give the Nohrians peace—just for today.
I've got a box of Hoshidan sweets. Oh, you want to try one?
I just don't know what I'd do without Oboro and Hinata.
I hope everyone will be happy with what I got them...
Of course I got you a gift. Hope it's what you wanted—I can't read your mind.
Sounds good.
Where to?
Let's be quick about it.
